doc:
Becky Wahlstrom https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Becky_Wahlstrom 0 Becky Wahlstrom (born April 25, 1975) is an American actress. She attended the London Academy of Music and Dramatic Art in England for her college years. Her credits to date include guest roles in television series Star Trek: Enterprise, Charmed, Mad Men, NCIS and Judging Amy, several theatre productions, including Shakespeare's Twelfth Night and the stage adaptation of Ray Bradbury's novel Fahrenheit 451, as well as a number of minor film roles. However, it was her regular supporting role as Grace Polk on the series Joan of Arcadia, alongside Amber Tamblyn, which has attracted most attention. She is also very active in supporting, promoting, and starring in regional theatre in the Los Angeles area. Becky_Wahlstrom ( born April_25_,_1975 ) is an_American_actress . She attended the_London_Academy of Music and Dramatic_Art in England for her_college_years . Her_credits to date include guest_roles in television_series_Star_Trek : Enterprise , Charmed , Mad_Men , NCIS and Judging Amy , several_theatre_productions , including Shakespeare 's_Twelfth_Night and the_stage_adaptation of Ray_Bradbury 's_novel_Fahrenheit 451 , as_well_as a_number of minor_film_roles . However , it was her regular_supporting_role as Grace_Polk on the_series_Joan of Arcadia , alongside Amber_Tamblyn , which has_attracted most_attention . She is also very_active in supporting , promoting , and starring in regional_theatre in the_Los_Angeles_area .
